xdm:attributablePartnerId.title: Attributable Partner ID
xdm:attributablePartnerId.description: The segment provider who owns the attributableSegmentId.

xdm:attributableSegmentId.title: Attributable Segment ID
xdm:attributableSegmentId.description: The single segment accredit for user targeting among all the segments in the placement's targeting rule for the purposes of tracking costs and paying partners.

xdm:segments.title: Segments
xdm:segments.description: The intersection of the user segments that both: a) the user belonged to, and b) the ad was targeting. NOT the full list of segments that the user belonged to at the time of the auction.
